name: Rogue Followers
description:
Rogue Followers!

Its a  snake-roguelike game inspired by Nokia 3310. 

A highscore game where you try to complete as many levels as you can! By picking followers to gather numbers while avoiding cannons!

How to Play

The door in the room you are in is locked; in order to open it, you need to complete the combination by picking the numbers that show up for you to collect.

The number tells you the minimum of followers you need to have to pick it up.

  1. Grab as many followers you need to pick up the number in the room.
  2. Pickup 3 numbers to open the door.
  3. Go through the door and escape to the next room.

Controls

  • Move = WASD / Arrows
  • Enter (Menu) = SPACE BAR
